document_data.caption: A map showing Dormythyrr's Ride in western Damara.
document_data.name: Dormythyrr's Ride
document_data.mainbody: '''Dormythyrr's Ride''' was the name given to a road in central [[Damara]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It connected the [[Duchy of Brandiar]] and the [[Duchy of Carmathan]].{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|81}}
document_data.Geography: The road connected [[Goliad]], the capital city of Brandiar, on its northern end to [[Ravensburg]], the capital city of Carmathan, on its southern end. It passed through the village of [[Canipe]] in Carmathan and crossed the [[Beaumaris River]] at the town of [[Brahms]].
document_data.History: The road was named for [[Dormythyrr]], a hero and regent of Brandiar following the defeat of [[Zhengyi the Witch-King]] in the [[Bloodstone Wars]] of [[1359 DR]].
